mapper.select: SELECT atype.article_type_name,count(*) as article_num FROM articles AS a INNER JOIN article_type AS atype ON a.article_type_id = atype.id GROUP BY atype.article_type_name HAVING count(*)>0;
select * from articles a inner join article_type atype on a.article_type_id = atype.id order by a.comments desc limit 0,3;
